name: e2e-mobile-tests
description: End-to-end mobile automation tests for PearPass (Android & iOS, BrowserStack & local)

scripts.e2e:android:bs: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=bs ENABLE_QASE=true ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:ios:bs: cross-env PLATFORM=iOS RUN_TARGET=bs ENABLE_QASE=true ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:android:local: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_real_android ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:ios:local: cross-env PLATFORM=iOS RUN_TARGET=local_real_ios ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:android:emulator: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio
scripts.test:signup: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio -- --suite signup && node slack-stats.js
scripts.test:onboarding: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio -- --suite onboarding && node slack-stats.js
scripts.test:sidebar: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio -- --suite sidebar && node slack-stats.js
scripts.test:sidebar-only: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true npm run wdio -- --suite sidebarOnly && node slack-stats.js
scripts.test:settings: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=false npm run wdio -- --suite settingsOnly && node slack-stats.js
scripts.test:all: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false ENABLE_SLACK=true PUSH_TEST_DATA=true npm run wdio -- --suite all && node slack-stats.js
